features.name: Authentication System
features.description: Firebase-based authentication with role-based access control for students and teachers, JWT token management, and user registration

features.name: Profile Management
features.description: Role-specific profile pages for students and teachers with editable information, profile pictures, and form validation

features.name: Batch Management
features.description: Teachers can create, edit, and manage batches/classrooms with shareable links and passwords for student access

features.name: Student Batch Joining
features.description: Students can join batches using shareable links and passwords, with membership tracking in database

features.name: Submission System
features.description: Students can create submissions with text content and optional file attachments, teachers can review and accept/reject submissions

features.name: Real-time Updates
features.description: Socket.IO integration for real-time submission status updates and notifications

features.name: Dashboard System
features.description: Role-specific dashboards for teachers and students with different views and functionalities

features.name: UI Components
features.description: Modern, responsive UI components using shadcn/ui with dark/light theme support and mobile-first design

features.name: Navigation System
features.description: Role-based navigation with modern sidebar, responsive design, and active page highlighting

features.name: API Routes
features.description: Next.js API routes for frontend-backend communication with proper error handling and validation

features.name: Database Management
features.description: MySQL database connection, schema setup, and table initialization with proper error handling

features.name: Security & Validation
features.description: Input validation, sanitization, rate limiting, and security headers for API protection

features.name: File Upload
features.description: File upload functionality for profile pictures and submission attachments

features.name: Utility Functions
features.description: Helper functions for API calls, authentication testing, and common utilities
